item.title: Plugins - Apache Maven Tutorial â€“ CodeTab
item.description: Maven Plugins The previous chapter explained the concept of Maven Lifecycle and Phases. Lifecycle phases are just steps without any capability to carryout some task and they delegate the actual work to Maven Plugins. This chapter on Maven Plugins cover plugins goal, how they bind with lifecycle phases and plugin configuration. The Maven core is small and it’s just capable of parsing XML files such as pom.xml and manage lifecycle and phases.
